"Uncharted 3: 황금사막의 아틀란티스™" 헬리콥터 컴패니언

Uncharted 3: Drake's Deception™ Helicopter
kDesc
Walk around PlayStation®Home with this Helicopter Companion item and show everyone how you beat Wave 3. [#Legal]
Promenez-vous dans PlayStation®Home avec cet objet compagnon hélicoptère pour montrer à tout le monde comment vous avez éliminé la vague 3. [#Legal]
Gehe mit deinem Helikopter-Begleiter durch PlayStation®Home und zeige allen, dass du Welle 3 absolviert hast. [#Legal]
Passeggia per PlayStation®Home con questa mascotte elicottero e fai sapere a tutti che hai completato la terza ondata. [#Legal]
Paséate por PlayStation®Home con esta mascota helicóptero y presume ante todos de cómo derrotaste la oleada 3. [#Legal]
헬리콥터 컴패니언과 함께 홈을 산책하면서 어떻게 웨이브 3을 마쳤는지 자랑하십시오. [#Legal]
Walk around PlayStation®Home with this Helicopter Companion item and show everyone how you beat Wave 3. [#Legal]
跟這個直升機隨身夥伴一起在PlayStation®Home內四處逛，告訴大家你如何完 成第3關。 [#Legal]
跟這個直升機隨身夥伴一起在PlayStation®Home內四處逛，告訴大家你如何完 成第3關。 [#Legal]
Walk around PlayStation®Home with this Helicopter Companion item and show everyone how you beat Wave 3. [#Legal]
